title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Short-Term Mathematical Creativity Development Through Object-Based Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic music theory knowledge and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mathematical patterns in rhythmic patterns with 80% accuracy using digital instruments and tablets.
Learners complete assignments expressing scale structures as geometric graphs using music software tools.
Learners present solutions to collaboration challenges in music production through mathematical algorithm design.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
